attributes.action: Ban cars which use twice the fuel per mile than cars with a similar passenger capacity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has banned traditional recyclable light bulbs that use more energy (but give a better light) and is forcing people to use compact fluorescent bulbs containing mercury and plastics:- We now call on the government to ban cars that use twice the fuel per mile than cars with a similar passenger capacity.  

This would show that the government is serious about the environment and not just picking on people who like to "drive" luxury light bulbs.
